Overview  Package   Extension 

org::fornax::utilities::xtendtools::lib
Extension collections

This extension provides functions for procesing collections.
Author:
Ingo Feltes
Function Summmary
Collectionunique(Collection this)
    Creates a collection containing only unique elements.
Collectionpack(Collection this)
    Removes all empty (null) elements from the list.
Listconcat(Object o, Collection c)
    Returns a new list that contains o and all elements of c.
Listconcat(Collection c, Object o)
    Returns a new list that contains all elements of c and o.
Listconcat(Collection c1, Collection c2)
    Returns a list that contains all elements of c1 and all elements of c2.
Listreplace(List this, Object search, Object replacement)
    Replaces the object search with replacement in the given list.
Listset(List this, Integer index, Object value)
    Sets the entry at position index of the given list to value.
Listinsert(List this, Integer index, Object value)
    Inserts the element value at the position index.
